mapper.sql: id, brand_id, contact_name, station_name, city_name, area_name, station_address, lng, lat, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from brand_address where brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into brand_address
brand_id,
contact_name,
station_name,
city_name,
area_name,
station_address,
lng,
lat,
create_time,
update_time,
#{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stationAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update brand_address
contact_name = #{contactName},
station_name = #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
station_address = #{stationAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lng = #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update brand_address set station_name = #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, station_address = #{stationAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lng = #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
